attributes.review: Do not get this app! I downloaded and it hacked all my information! Whatever you do DONT INSTALL IT! Get this app deleted now before it hacks others and get it off the app store! It isn’t good for others to have a possibility of getting hacked!
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: Seriously the worst app that I’ve ever use I asked my cousin to get my phone to open up this new app that I downloaded to see what Trump is doing in the picture in the beginning made her legally blind
attributes.title: Don’t recommend

attributes.review:
this app is so scary, and shouldn’t be on the app store. as a citizen of america, i was looking forward to seeing what was on the app, and maybe reconsider my political stance, but now i’m going to move to europe. who wants to come?? 

xoxo,
Mike Pence
attributes.title: ✨👑💅🏻all presidents matter🥳💕🦋 just not this one 🦩✨🌺

attributes.review: This app was the WORST app I have ever downloaded! 😤 This app kept crashing the software was awful. I got awful racist messages constantly. This app is horrible do not download. Would give 0 stars if possible
attributes.title: Awful app

attributes.review: When I opened this app to support our amazing cheese ball, 30 seconds in and it was all full of these weird ideas about how schools should open and how covid doesn’t matter anymore.
attributes.title: Absolutely Terrible

attributes.review: i downloaded this app thinking good things😔 unfortunately shrek came to my doorstep and bashed in my windows. then trump himself came and punched my grandma and stole all my money.❌💰🖕 I am very very sad now and without money all because of this app.
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app, it took over a week! I was on WiFi the whole time! When it asked if I was voting for Trump, I clicked on undecided and I got a video montage of all the hateful things Trump had said! Would not recommend
attributes.title: Cheetos? Nah

attributes.review:
Anytime I try to open the app I get kicked out and my phone powers off. I finally deleted it, heads up deleting this app may remove its hate speech from you phone. 

I may not be a fairy ✨💖🧚🏻🌟🎊🎉but trump definitely is🎊🌟✨❤️
attributes.title: Terrible application

attributes.review: This app must have been made by children in daycare. Stupid app, UI is sloppy, buttons have delayed response, too many terms and agreements, sketchy too. I feel like it pulled into from my phone . Please do not install this app.
attributes.title: Terrible app.

attributes.review: This app is horrible the instructions were unclear so I put my phone in the fish tank (so the prez could be with is orange kind) and it instantly shocked my goldfish and killed it! I had to go get a new phone! I do not recommend it!
attributes.title: Killed my goldfish
